artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Masadaya Heikichi
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 280.3; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), fig. 84, p. 284.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: one sheet; younger woman wearing blue kimono with white patterning and red trim wrestling with a wrinkled elderly figure with white hair, wearing a green and blue skirt and holding a knife in her PR hand; screen and door with tears in paper in background
markings: Artist’s seal: 号魁斎 {Gō Kaisai} | Censor seal: 壬申十一
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Essays by Yoshitoshi (Ikkai zuihitsu 一魁随筆)
signed: 一魁斎芳年筆 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: The Old Hag of the Lonely House
